message: S3 Bucket allows public READ access
description: The S3 bucket 'example-bucket' is publicly readable. This may expose sensitive data.

message: IAM user has full administrative privileges
description: The IAM user 'admin' has been granted AdministratorAccess policy. Consider applying least-privilege.

message: Security Group allows inbound SSH from 0.0.0.0/0
description: An EC2 instance allows unrestricted SSH access, which is a potential attack vector.

message: Database instance is not encrypted at rest
description: Encryption should be enabled to protect sensitive data at rest.
